name: Margherita Pizza
description: Classic Italian pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves.

name: Cheeseburger
description: Juicy grilled burger topped with melted cheddar cheese, lettuce, tomato, and pickles.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Fresh salmon filet grilled to perfection, served with steamed vegetables and lemon butter sauce.

name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Decadent molten chocolate cake served with vanilla ice cream.

name: Vanilla Milkshake
description: Creamy milkshake made with fresh vanilla bean ice cream and whipped cream.
